desc: Made with the softest MicroModal on the market. Underair is the only clothing with our kelp-based Seeweev material. It's so amazing at odor control you can wear them for 5 days before washing! All our clothing comes with Ready-to-Wear pre-wash service so you can put it on as soon as it arrives.

layout.text: Our underwear is the best thing you'll ever feel on your skin.
